trans-unit.source: Manages the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects for any object that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> para qualquer objeto que herda da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

trans-unit.source: Each Windows Form has at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> object that manages the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the form.
trans-unit.target: Cada formulário do Windows tem pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objeto que gerencia o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objetos para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class is abstract, the return type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property is either a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe é abstrata, o tipo de retorno de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> ou um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the <xref:System.Type> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados é um objeto que pode retornar apenas uma única propriedade (em vez de uma lista de objetos), o <xref:System.Type> é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> como fonte de dados, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> será retornado.

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, se a fonte de dados é um objeto que implementa <xref:System.Collections.IList> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> será retornado.

trans-unit.source: For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Para cada fonte de dados em um formulário do Windows, há um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.

trans-unit.source: Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> enables you to retrieve any particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associated with a data source.
trans-unit.target: Como pode haver várias fontes de dados associados a um formulário do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> permite que você recupere qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associado a uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> se ainda não existir.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode levar a alguma confusão, como o objeto retornado não pode gerenciar a lista (ou qualquer lista) que você pretende.

trans-unit.source: To prevent returning an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the intended <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar o retorno inválido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> método para determinar se o pretendido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> já existe.

trans-unit.source: If you use a container control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, to contain data-bound controls, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> for just that container control and its controls.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar um controle de contêiner, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, para conter controles associados a dados, você pode criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> para apenas esse contêiner e seus controles.

trans-unit.source: Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, cada parte do formulário pode ser gerenciado por sua própria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor for more information about creating multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> construtor para obter mais informações sobre como criar vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objetos para a mesma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: If you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of that form.
trans-unit.target: Se você adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle a um formulário e vincular a uma coluna de uma tabela em um conjunto de dados, o controle se comunica com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> desse formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>, in turn, talks to the specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for that data association.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>, por sua vez, se comunica com específico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> para essa associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: If you queried the `Position` property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, it would report the current record for the binding of that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Se você consultar o `Position` propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, ela poderia informar o registro atual para a associação que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> for the form it is on.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo de código a seguir, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle está vinculado a `FirstName` coluna de um `Customers` tabela o `dataSet1` conjunto de dados por meio do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> para o formulário está em.

trans-unit.source: You can add a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar um segundo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle (`TextBox2`) para o formulário e associá-lo para o `LastName` coluna o `Customers` tabela no mesmo conjunto de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> está ciente da primeira associação (`TextBox1` para `Customers.FirstName`), portanto, ele deve usar o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, como as duas caixas de texto associadas ao mesmo conjunto de dados (`DataSet1`).

trans-unit.source: If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates and manages a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Se você associar `TextBox2` para um conjunto de dados diferente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> cria e gerencia um segundo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.

trans-unit.source: It is important to be consistent about how you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> properties; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors.
trans-unit.target: É importante ser consistente sobre como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> propriedades; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> cria moeda vários gerenciadores de para o mesmo conjunto de dados, que resulta em erros.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra algumas maneiras de definir as propriedades e seus respectivos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objetos.

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir as propriedades usando um dos métodos a seguir, desde que seja consistente em todo o código.

trans-unit.source: Most Windows Forms applications bind through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: Associar a maioria dos aplicativos de formulários do Windows por meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component encapsulates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> and exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> programming interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> componente encapsula uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> e expõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> interface de programação.

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> for binding, you should use the members exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> para associação, você deve usar os membros expostos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> para manipular "moeda" (ou seja, `Position`) em vez de percorrer o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to bind five controls—a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> and four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls—to several data sources.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria quatro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objetos para associar controles dos cinco — um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> e quatro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles — para várias fontes de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> is then used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for each data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> é usado para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> para cada fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: If you want to have multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> instances for the same data source, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and set it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property of an object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser ter vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> instâncias da mesma fonte de dados, criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> e defina-a como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> propriedade de um objeto que herda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects (from two different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects), you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to different values.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objetos (de duas diferentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objetos), você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> propriedades de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> como valores diferentes.

trans-unit.source: This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que cada conjunto de controles associados a dados para exibir valores diferentes da mesma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates two new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects and assigns each object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria dois novos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objetos e atribui cada objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: `GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> class).
trans-unit.target: `GroupBox1` contém `TextBox1`, e `GroupBox2` contém `TextBox2` (que é realizado usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> classe).

trans-unit.source: The example then adds <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, binding each to the same data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objetos para os dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles de associação de cada um para o mesmo membro de dados e fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The example also shows two event handlers that use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controls to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property on different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também mostra dois manipuladores de eventos que usam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controles para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> propriedade em diferentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associado a uma fonte de dados específica à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associado a uma fonte de dados específica à coleção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataSource" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="listManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="listManager" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de todos os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Always raises a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> when handled.
trans-unit.target: Sempre gera um <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> quando manipulado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged> event is obsolete and always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged> evento está obsoleto e sempre gera um <xref:System.NotImplementedException> quando tratado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associado à fonte de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiver o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe para obter uma lista de possíveis fontes de dados e informações sobre como criar associações entre os controles e fontes de dados.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using only a data source.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade para obter informações sobre como retornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> usando apenas uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> exists for each control on a form.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> método para determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> existe para cada controle em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: The example passes each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo passa cada <xref:System.Data.DataTable> em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet> para o método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The information needed to resolve to a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: As informações necessárias para resolver para um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associado à fonte de dados e ao membro de dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiver o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe para uma lista de possíveis fontes de dados e para obter informações sobre como criar associações entre os controles e fontes de dados.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using a data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade para obter informações sobre como retornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> usando uma fonte de dados e um membro de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to test whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> exists before attempting to get it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> método para testar se um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> existe antes de tentar obtê-lo por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a coleção for somente leitura; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>e é substituído para retornar sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados associada a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> em particular.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> that is associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associada à fonte de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> for the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> da fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> you want does not require a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> desejado não requer um caminho de navegação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects that use an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, no navigation path is required.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> gerencia um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objetos que usam um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> ou <xref:System.Data.DataTable> como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, não é necessário nenhum caminho de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, and never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade sempre retornará uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>e nunca retornará `null`.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe para uma lista de possíveis fontes de dados e para obter informações sobre como criar associações entre os controles e fontes de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects: one for a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, one for an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and one for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> that belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir retorna três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objetos: um para um <xref:System.Data.DataView>, um para um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>e outro para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> que pertence a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados associada a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> em particular.

trans-unit.source: A navigation path containing the information that resolves to a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Um caminho de navegação que contém as informações que são resolvidas como um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> específico.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> that is associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associado à fonte de dados e ao membro de dados associados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> for the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> da fonte de dados e do membro de dados associados.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects for which the data source contains multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> gerencia um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objetos para o qual a fonte de dados contém vários objetos.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> can contain several <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects linked by <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Data.DataSet> pode conter vários <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objetos vinculados por <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objetos.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o caminho de navegação é necessário para habilitar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> para retornar o correto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, when the `dataMember` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> propriedade sempre retornará uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, quando o `dataMember` parâmetro é válido.

trans-unit.source: It will never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Nunca retornarão `null`.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe para uma lista de possíveis fontes de dados e para obter informações sobre como criar associações entre os controles e fontes de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list.
trans-unit.target: Se desejado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> gerencia uma lista, o caminho de navegação também deve terminar com uma lista.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code binds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the order date in a table of orders.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o código c# a seguir associa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle para a data do pedido em uma tabela de pedidos.

trans-unit.source: The navigation path includes the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de navegação inclui o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, o <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>e o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> must be retrieved using only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (which resolves to a list).
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> devem ser recuperados usando apenas o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> e <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (que resolve para uma lista).

trans-unit.source: When returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, you should use the same data source as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> and modify only the navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Ao retornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, você deve usar a mesma fonte de dados como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> e modificar o caminho de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> método para determinar se os detalhes desejados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> já existe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for a particular binding.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> para recuperar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> para uma associação específica.

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.BindingComplete> event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ele também mostra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.BindingComplete> eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> para garantir que vários controles associados à mesma fonte de dados permaneçam sincronizados quando um dos valores de controle é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o código em um formulário do Windows e a chamada a `InitializeControlsAndData` método de construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="dataMember" /> does not exist within the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="dataMember" /> especificado não existe na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados associada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Exclui a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associada à fonte de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados associada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Remove a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associada à fonte de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Array" /> para o qual copiar.

trans-unit.source: The collection index to begin copying from.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coleção do qual começar a copiar.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection into a specified array, starting at the collection index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos da coleção em uma matriz especificada, começando no índice da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> objects managed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> gerenciados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of data sources managed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de fontes de dados gerenciados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> objects managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir retorna o número de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> objetos gerenciados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção está sincronizada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a coleção é thread-safe; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>e é substituído para retornar sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object to use for synchronization (thread safety).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto a ser usado para sincronização (acesso thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />, and is overridden to always return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é derivada de <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />e é substituído para retornar sempre <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador para a coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method allows you to iterate over the collection managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> método permite que você iterar pela coleção gerenciada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> método para retornar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to associate with the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> a ser associado ao novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> with a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Associa um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> a um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended update the bindings of components that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, when their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> changes.
trans-unit.target: Este método destina-se atualizar as associações dos componentes que implementam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> alterações.
